// remark: Notably, the existing sfy-*.xml files seem to have three completely
different <nuclides> nodes. One contains some number of <nuclide>
child nodes. Another, always located inside <productYield> nodes,
contains an array of strings, for example:
Finally, another, always located in <yields> nodes, always (in the
present collection of sfy-*.xml files, at least) has only an 'href'
string metadatum. The last two appear to be intended to represent
the same thing, with one possibly just referring to the other instead
of providing the vector of strings directly. With this in mind, I've
provided one <nuclides> spec for the first of the above varieties of
<nuclides> nodes, and one more to handle the second and third types.

shape.remark: comma-separated pair of ints; use string for now
